title: Phone automatically turned off due to heat while facetime.
content:
I've been using Pixel3 for 6 months and have the same problem.
My pixel3 always turns off due to heat while video call via Line Application( Kind of Messenger type).
I've searched through internet but I didnt get what I've been looking for.
I kinda worried about my Pixel3 will get a problem soon, because now my phone performance getting worse. 
Please help, and sorry for my language.
